overview.description: This document provides XML documentation for a collection of classes related to various functionality in a software system.

class.name: Color
class.description: The `Color` class represents a color with various attributes.

class.name: ConfigFile
class.description: The `ConfigFile` class handles reading and writing configuration files.

class.name: Console
class.description: The `Console` class provides console-related features, including text color settings.

class.name: CryptoKey
class.description: The `CryptoKey` class represents cryptographic keys used for encryption and decryption.

class.name: Error
class.description: The `Error` class defines error codes and messages for error handling.

class.name: Extension
class.description: The `Extension` class represents a file extension with case sensitivity attributes.

class.name: Log
class.description: The `Log` class provides a logging mechanism with various log levels.

class.name: LogFile
class.description: The `LogFile` class handles logging messages to a file.

class.name: Packer
class.description: The `Packer` class handles packing and moving files with specific criteria.

class.name: Platform
class.description: The `Platform` class provides platform-specific functionality, such as setting console text colors.

class.name: Variant
class.description: The `Variant` class represents a variant data type that can store various data types.
